decision_conditions: The window(s) on the side flanking walls at first floor shall be of purpose-made obscure glass, top opening only, upto 1.8m above first floor level, and shall thereafter be retained in that form.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the side elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

The&nbsp;materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the alterations and any making good, hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building and/or specified materials within the submission documents.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:</p><ul><li>Combined Existing &amp; Proposed Plans, Elevations &amp; Site Plan (AmendeD) Drawing No: 2310 EP01 Rev Aâ€™;</li><li>Planning Design and Access Statement entitled Report Ref: 2310.PLN.26.05.23;</li><li>Flood Risk Assessment entitled Report Ref: 2310.PLN.22.06.23.Flood;</li></ul>

The development hereby permitted shall
be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
